title: The knaue of clubbs
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: [By Edward Allde] for W. Ferebrand, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Pallace,
notes: Running title reads: The knaue of clubs.
The first edition, of which no copy is known, entitled "A merry meeting or 'tis merry when knaves meet", 1600, was ordered burned.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
